#{empId}

and salary_year_month = DATE_FORMAT(#{now}, '%Y-%m')
and salary_emp_id in
#{empId}

select '薪酬' as id, monthTab.mon as name, COALESCE(sum(salary_net_pay), 0) as value from ( select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 11 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 10 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 9 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 8 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 5 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 4 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` union all select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y-%m') AS `mon` ) monthTab left join emp_salary on monthTab.mon = emp_salary.salary_year_month and emp_salary.disabled=0 and emp_salary.salary_emp_id =#{empId} GROUP BY monthTab.mon
SELECT sum(salary_net_pay) FROM emp_salary where salary_year_month like concat(#{salaryYearMonth}, '%') and salary_emp_id = #{salaryEmpId} and disabled = 0
